long description: Unlimited Local Idea Mobile Calls (12 AM to 6 AM) --

Unlimited On Net local/STD mobile calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.10/min (MRP 149) & tariff @ Rs 0.30/min (MRP 348) will be applicable. -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.

Unlimited Local calls --  Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable. -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.
20,000 Local + STD Mobile Seconds -- 25p/min Local+STD Mobile Calls (25p/min will be applicable post 20,000 mobile seconds)
500 Local Mobile Min. -- Free Missed Call Alert Service for 30 days, Offer valid only once in a lifetime

Unlimited Local/National Calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.10/min (MRP 149) & tariff @ Rs 0.30/min (MRP 348) will be applicable -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.

Unlimited Local/STD calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.10/min (MRP 149) & tariff @ Rs 0.30/min (MRP 348) will be applicable. -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.

Unlimited Local/STD calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.10/min (MRP 149) & tariff @ Rs 0.30/min (MRP 348) will be applicable. -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.
